bioconda.name: sambamba
bioconda.summary: Tools for working with SAM/BAM data.

biocontainers.name: sambamba
biocontainers.summary: Tools for working with sam/bam data

biotools.summary: This tool is a high performance modern robust and fast tool (and library), written in the D programming language, for working with SAM, BAM and CRAM formats.

bioschemas.name: Sambamba
bioschemas.summary: This tool is a high performance modern robust and fast tool (and library), written in the D programming language, for working with SAM, BAM and CRAM formats.
